entry.title: python爬取猫眼电影榜单top100数据
entry.content: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657import datetimeimport reimport requestsfrom requests.exceptions import RequestExceptiondef get_one_page(url): try: response = requests.get(url) if response.status_code == 200: return response.text return None except RequestException: return Nonedef parse_one_page(html): # <dd>.*?board-index.*?>(\ d+)</i>.*?data-src="(.*?)".*?name"><a.*?>(.*?)</a>.*?star">(.*?)</p>.*?releasetime">(.*?)</p>.*?integer">(.*?)</i>.*?fraction">(.*?)</i>.*?</dd> pattern= re.compile('<dd>.*?board-index.*?>(\d+)</i>.*?data-src="(.*?)".*?name"><a.*?>(.*?)</a>.*?star">(.*?)</p>.*?releasetime">(.*?)</p>.*?integer">(.*?)</i>.*?fraction">(.*?)</i>.*?</dd>',re.S) items = re.findall(pattern,html) print("当前页面有 "+str(len(items))+" 条数据\n") print(items) # for item in items: # yield { # 'index': item[0], # 'image': item[1], # 'title': item[2] # } # print(item) # return ;def main(): url = "http://maoyan.com/board/4?" html = get_one_page(url) parse_one_page(html)def printDate(): print("当前时间->") print(datetime.datetime.now())# define exceptiondef toException(): try: print("eeee") except RequestException: return Noneif __name__ == '__main__': printDate() main()

entry.title: 绝佳的hexo+github+theme+admin博客搭建流程
entry.content: 安装Hexo $ npm install -g hexo-cli 新建个人Blog 123$ hexo init <folder> $ cd <folder> $ npm install 安装后台插件 1https://www.cnblogs.com/xingyunblog/p/8681205.html

entry.title: 开发问题总结
entry.content: 1，问题:ssh Permission denied (publickey) 解决方案：1https://www.cnblogs.com/896240130Master/p/8337809.html 2，问题 Appium Could not detect Mac OS X Version from sw_vers output: ‘10.12 ‘ 解决方案：1https://blog.csdn.net/achang21/article/details/6492263
